FuncDef: This command configures a TCA for the counter capturing hits for the specified SCTP filter default PPID. A default action TCA can be created for traffic generated from the subscriber side of AA (from-sub) or for traffic generated from the network toward the AA subscriber (to-sub). Thecreatekeyword is mandatory when creating a default action TCA.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the traffic direction. Values-from-sub, to-sub.
Keyword used to create the TCA.
